name: CIGIDEN Hub
description: IDE-CIGIDEN Hub is an ArcGIS Hub site presenting data catalogs and resources related to disaster risk, research, and geospatial information in Chile and Latin America. The catalog includes datasets, maps, and apps from various research and governmental entities.
owner_name: CIGIDEN - Research Center for Integrated Disaster Risk Management (Centro de Investigación para la Gestión Integrada del Riesgo de Desastres)
